frontmatter.description: This year in ByteConf2020 I got to know about GatsbyJS, and I really found it interesting so, I thought of giving it a try. As developers, we always look out for some cool tech stacks which are powerful, practical and save us from some serious mundane tasks. So, in this post, I would like to explain why I chose GatsbyJS to build my blogging site.
frontmatter.title: Why I chose GatsbyJS for my blogs
